name: Funfair Ride Simulator: Outer Space
description:
Did you ever control your own carnival ride? Sure not. But now you have the opportunity to catch up with the "Funfair Ride Simulator: Outer Space" on your Smartphone and Tablet!

Control and marvel the breathtaking "Outer Space" ride.

CONTROL
Control your own ride with all possible movements and light controls.

RIDE
"Take your seat and fly!" - Hop on your ride and enjoy the ride in "point of view" sight.

ENJOY
Enjoy your own funfair ride with tons of different light and fog effects.

FEATURES
• Realistic movement and physics
• Fully controllable
• Unique fairground / carnival atmosphere
• people in the gondolas
• light and sound effects
• day / night
• different camera angles including "POV"
• Cash box with camera
• innovative interface
• compact GUI and panel view
• Recording / Playback function
• Some cameras can be moved by wiping gesture

ATTENTION: This is the standalone version of the Outer Space ride, which also is available via InApp in "Funfair Ride Simulator 2" - if you want to have multiple rides, then go with Funfair Ride Simulator 2.
